name: Firefox 3 theme for firefox 4+ dropmarker fix
description: This style fixes the back-forward dropmarker style (if you have it installed) for Firefox 3 theme for Firefox 4+
additional_info:
currently, this style DOES NOT WORK FOR SMALL ICONS MODE!
ONLY USE THIS IF YOU HAVE "Firefox 3 theme for Firefox 4+" or "Firefox 3 theme for Firefox 4+ Reloaded!" theme installed on for Firefox.
